Do urselves a favor FOR JUST ONCE IN SOME OF UR LIVES PLEASE? Don't try 2 make a huge profit off of Coronavirus testing. Just pay the techs & local lab & minimal charge per traveler. Greed monsters create worse nightmares & lies. #Coronavirus

So charge a small test fee 4 travelers! Bulk testing across borders ensures chance of halting various viruses & helps a person get treatment quicker. What's more ethical? U can charge $20 EA have more than enough to pay the lab techs & lil lab right there at airports #Coronavirus

Answer this riddle: Which is more expensive?: Allowing all types of travelers across borders who don't seem to have issues, or if they do just forget it cause it's way 2 much money 2 test: Or in 2 yrs with investment in tests 4 travelers 4 preventative purposes? #Coronavirus
